setting.name: *spam_interval
setting.desc: The minimal number of miliseconds between messages, which are not a spam.

setting.name: *spammer_kick
setting.desc: Set to true if script should kick spammers. If it is false, script mutes them for 60 seconds.

setting.name: *allow_rate_change
setting.desc: Allow changing rate for map by player.

setting.name: *max_ping
setting.desc: If not equal 0, script kick laggers with ping bigger than this value.

setting.name: *max_ping_time
setting.desc: Number of seconds the player has to have ping above maximal, to be kicked.

setting.name: *min_fps_div
setting.desc: If equal 0, this setting does not control minimal FPS. Otherwise minimal FPS is equal minimum of averange FPS devided by this number and 'Minimal FPS' setting. If player has got smaller FPS, he is kicked.

setting.name: *min_fps
setting.desc: If equal 0, this setting does not control minimal FPS. Otherwise minimal FPS is equal minimum of this number and averange FPS devided by 'Minimal FPS divisor'. If player has got smaller FPS, he is kicked.

setting.name: *time_zone
setting.desc: Timezone for the server

setting.name: *kill_afk
setting.desc: Kill players, which does not move for the number of seconds.

setting.name: *upload_addr
setting.desc: Address showed by !upload command.

setting.name: *mute_time
setting.desc: Number of seconds, during which player is muted after !mute command. If it equals 0, mute stop working when player quit.

setting.name: *auto_clean_db_interval
setting.desc: Number of minutes between following database cleanings. Set to 0 to disable database autocleaning. To apply this setting you have to restart the script.

setting.name: *disable_fps_limit
setting.desc: If set to true script automatically disables FPS limit on maps without checkpoints.
setting.friendlyname: Disable FPS limit for not race maps

setting.name: *msgs_above_players
setting.desc: If set to true, script will show all chat messages above players for 5 seconds.

setting.name: *breakable_glass
setting.desc: If set to true, script will show glass hole when your vehicle get big demage.

setting.name: *red_damage_screen
setting.desc: If set to true, script will change screen color to red for a moment when your vehicle get big demage.

setting.name: *announc_interval
setting.desc: Interval of printing announcements in seconds.

setting.name: *max_warns
setting.desc: If player has more warnings, he is banned. Set to 0 to disable banning for warnings.

setting.name: *min_nick_change_delay
setting.desc: Minimal delay between changing nick in seconds.

setting.name: *stunt_bonus
setting.desc: Bonus for making stunts. 'stunt' resource is needed.

setting.name: *clan_teams
setting.desc: If enabled player names will be searched for tags in form of (tag), [tag] or |tag|. Player with tags will have they own teams

setting.name: *win_events
setting.desc: If enabled random event will happen when player won DD match (for example gravity will be set to 0)

setting.name: *censor
setting.desc: If enabled players messages are censored.

setting.name: *max_map_rep
setting.desc: Maximal number of repeats of the map. If equal 0 map can be repeated infinited number of times.

setting.name: *no_gm_warning_time
setting.desc: Number of seconds, during which warning, before disabling Ghost-mode, is displayed.

setting.name: *bidlvl_price
setting.desc: Price of 1 bidlevel. Next bidlevels will cost this price * level. For example level 2 will cost this number * 2.

setting.name: *bet_time
setting.desc: Number of seconds after map start, in which player can bet. Value of 0 disables betting.

setting.name: *max_bet
setting.desc: Maximal bet for 1st bidlevel. For next bidlevels it will be this value multiplied by level.

setting.name: *bet_min_players
setting.desc: Minimal number of players needed to enable betting.

setting.name: *max_viel
setting.desc: Max speed of players in horizontal plane. If 0 detecting of speed cheaters will be disabled.

setting.name: *max_viel_kick
setting.desc: If true players with too big speed will be kicked. Otherwise only chat message will be generated.

setting.name: *fps_anticheat
setting.desc: Kick player if he has got FPS above the limit.

setting.name: *show_ac_msgs
setting.desc: If set to true and no online player has access to AC messages, they are sent to everybody.

setting.name: *lotto_limit
setting.desc: Amount of cash in fund, needed to finish the lottery.

setting.name: *max_tickets
setting.desc: Maximal number of lottery tickets, which player can buy.

setting.name: *fund_inc_interval
setting.desc: Number of seconds after which script increase lottery fund. Set to 0 to disable automatical fund increase

setting.name: *max_fund_inc
setting.desc: Maximal amount of cash, which can be added automatically to lottery fund.

setting.name: *votenext_enabled
setting.desc: Enables or disables vote for next map. If vote is accepted next map is set and opened after current map end.

setting.name: *auto_votekick
setting.desc: If set to true votekick is enabled only, when noone can use !kick command, otherwise votekick is disabled.

setting.name: *auto_votemap
setting.desc: If set to true votemap is enabled only if noone can use !map command, otherwise votemap is disabled.

setting.name: *vote_between_maps
setting.desc: If set to 1, map ratings are shown. If set to 2, in vote are only two options: Random and Play again. If set to 3, in vote are options: DD, DM, Race, Other and Play again. If set to 0, vote is not modified.

setting.name: *recorder
setting.desc: Enables or disables recording of top times in Race and DM maps.

setting.name: *cp_recorder
setting.desc: Enables or disables recording of top times in Race and DM maps (CPs).

setting.name: *ghost
setting.desc: Shows or hides ghost of top time in Race and DM maps.

setting.name: *private_db
setting.desc: If enabled data is saved in db.sqlite private db instead of server registry

setting.name: *db_backup_int
setting.desc: Number of days when database backup is made. If set to 0 backups will not be generated. Only supported for private database.

setting.name: *max_db_backups
setting.desc: Maximal number of backups saved. Only supported for private database.
